data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Goal! Takayoshi Ishihara gives Sendai a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 1, Koji Hachisuka instrumental with a fine assist.
Hayato Shimizu has awarded Oita a corner.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 6, Oita are coming forward and Yamato Machida gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Hayato Shimizu awards Sendai a goal kick.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 7, Hayato Shimizu signals a Sendai throw-in in Oita's half.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Oita takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 12, Free kick Sendai.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Oita pushes forward through Kei Chinen, whose finish on goal is saved.
Oita's Yamato Machida is on target but unsuccessful.
Shun Nagasawa of Sendai is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 20, Oita to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Sendai.
Free kick for Oita in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 26, Sendai are caught offside.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Sendai.
Yushi Hasegawa (Oita) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 30, Yoshiki Matsushita (Sendai) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in Oita.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
In the minute 33, At Showa Denko Dome Oita, Oita are penalized for being offside.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Oita.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Oita.
Free kick Sendai.
In the minute 38, Yamato Machida (Oita) has received a first yellow card.
Shun Nagasawa's header is off-target for Sendai.
Goal kick for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 40, Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Sendai.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Hayato Shimizu awards Sendai a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Oita in the half of Sendai.
Free kick Oita.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
The first-half is over at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Can Sendai capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Toshio Shimakawa with Yuki Kobayashi. This is the first substitution made today by Tomohiro Katanosaka.
Sendai are pushing forward but Yoshiki Matsushita's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Sendai surge into the attack at Showa Denko Dome Oita but Shun Nagasawaâ€™s header is off-target.
Oita have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sendai at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 52, Sendai drive upfield and Koji Hachisuka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Oita defender.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Oita.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Sendai.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Sendai at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Hayato Shimizu signals a Sendai throw-in in Oita's half.
In the minute 62, Hayato Shimizu awards the away team a throw-in.
Oita to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
The home team replace Kei Chinen with Yuya Takazawa.
In the minute 65, Tomohiro Katanosaka (Oita) is making a third substitution, with Kohei Isa replacing Yamato Machida.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Sendai make their first substitution with Kunimitsu Sekiguchi replacing Isaac Cuenca.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Sendai at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
In the minute 70, Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Yushi Hasegawa (Oita) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 73, Sendai's Hiroto Yamada gets in a shot on goal at Showa Denko Dome Oita. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Hiroto Yamada heads in to give Sendai a 0-2 lead at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 74, Great play from Kunimitsu Sekiguchi to set up the goal.
Sendai's Takayoshi Ishihara misses with an attempt on goal.
Oita have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Hayato Shimizu signals a Oita throw-in in Sendai's half.
Hayato Shimizu awards the home team a throw-in.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 80, Takuma Hamasaki is replacing Yoshiki Matsushita for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
Keita Takahata is on a sub for Yushi Hasegawa for Oita.
In the minute 83, In Oita, Sendai push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Oita.
In the minute 86, Hayato Shimizu awards Sendai a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
Sendai drives forward and Hiroto Yamada gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Oita in the half of Sendai.
Free kick for Oita in the half of Sendai.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 89, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Hayato Shimizu signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Oita's area.
Goal kick for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Sendai make their third substitution with Ryutaro Iio replacing Takayoshi Ishihara.
Takuma Nishimura is replacing Hiroto Yamada for the away team.
